## Description {#details}

A struct to capture parsed pass pipeline names.

A pipeline is defined as a series of names, each of which may in itself recursively contain a nested pipeline. A name is either the name of a pass (e.g. &quot;instcombine&quot;) or the name of a pipeline type (e.g. &quot;cgscc&quot;). If the name is the name of a pass, the InnerPipeline is empty, since passes cannot contain inner pipelines. See <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passbuilder/#a9ca0e57e6445ab2fe568e53ba29cc0fd">parsePassPipeline()</a> for a more detailed description of the textual pipeline format.

Definition at line 120 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>.
